data.actual_result: the "*" will show at either end of the message and the font will be normal/bold
data.expected_result: message will be in italics/bold italics
data.short_description: Italics/bold italics won't work when there is a single number/special character at the end of the message after one or more spaces
data.steps_to_repro: - type a message formatted for italics/bold italics - add a space/spaces and a single number/special character at the end of the message
